channel.title: I.p.?
channel.description:
Well, i don't know if this is posted in the wrong section since it has something to do with Hamachi, but i want to use it for RS servers. Oh well, here we go.
In the server advertisement section, when people advertise for their server, they tell I.P's. But i can't find a way to join an I.P, only networks. If you can help me, please post.
Thank you, Gramdtante
